meta.description:
When making your sim, remember the KISS Principle: Keep It Simple, Sucka.

At the bottom of this sidebar, you can SAVE and SHARE your sim. Have fun! 😘

states.name: Jokester
states.description: For a description, see Chandler from Friends.

states.name: Seer
states.description: See the baby's future self with the help of a magic ball!

states.name: AngelChild
states.description: This is the adorable, super polite angelchild that is adored by the whole neighborhood.

states.name: Nerd
states.description: This is the hard-core nerd that does Calculus problems for kicks on a Friday night.

states.name: SassMaster
states.description: This person is the Queen/King of Sass.

states.name: Businessman
states.description: This is the cutthroat businessman that eventually becomes the CEO of some company and has a worth of millions/billions of $$.

states.name: Cat
states.description: This is a cat. No description needed.

states.name: CoolKid
states.description: This is the cool kid at school.

states.name: Uncertain
states.description: We don't know this baby's future

states.name: Athlete
states.description: This is the super sporty kid that runs 9 miles for a workout warm-up.
